scripts.deploy:mumbai: ts-node ./scripts/completeSubgraph.ts --network mumbai && graph deploy --product hosted-service fanz-events/fanz-events-mumbai  --ipfs http://ipfs.fanszoid.com/
scripts.deploy:matic: ts-node ./scripts/completeSubgraph.ts --network matic && graph deploy --product hosted-service fanz-events/fanz-events-matic  --ipfs http://ipfs.fanszoid.com/
